CIPHER.189.cipherString: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.
CIPHER.189.question: Solve this quote by Shaun Hick.

CIPHER.200.cipherString: Even when we do not actively participate in our destiny, we are still on a chosen path. Life has a way of making decisions for us.
CIPHER.200.question: Solve this K1 alphabet encoded Patristocrat which is a quote by Nina Guilbeau.

CIPHER.193.cipherString: Before you criticize a man, walk a mile in his shoes. That way, when you do criticize him, you'll be a mile away and have his shoes.
CIPHER.193.question: Decode this phrase by Steve Martin which has been encoded using a Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.196.cipherString: Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.
CIPHER.196.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Roy T. Bennett.

CIPHER.207.question: Using a key of LOST, compute the decryption matrix for a 2x2 Hill cipher using a 26 character alphabet.

CIPHER.205.cipherString: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
CIPHER.205.question: Figure out what these strange headlines encoded using a Baconian alphabet mean.  It was said by Thomas Merton and starts out with EVER. What does it say?

CIPHER.201.question: Encode this phrase from Urmila Sahu using the Affine cipher with a=11 and b=9.

CIPHER.198.cipherString: Two fined a mountain path awl buy oneself gives a grater feeling of strength than two taek a path that is shone.
CIPHER.198.question: Solve this Aristocrat encoded quote by Karen Horney which was misheard and then typed in with mistakes before being encoded with a K2 alphabet.

CIPHER.203.cipherString: You grow up the day you have your first real laugh – at yourself.
CIPHER.203.question: Decode this phrase by Ethel Barrymore which was encoded with with the Vigènere cipher using the keyword DECOY.

CIPHER.195.cipherString: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
CIPHER.195.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Robert Orben in which the word THE appears twice.

CIPHER.190.cipherString: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
CIPHER.190.question: Encode this phrase by Roy T. Bennett using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.206.cipherString: Las cámaras digitales son un gran invento, porque nos permiten recordar grandes momentos.
CIPHER.206.translation: Digital cameras are a great invention, because they allow us to remember great moments.
CIPHER.206.question: Solve this Xenocrypt in Spanish which is a quote by Demetri Martin that has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.

CIPHER.202.cipherString: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
CIPHER.202.question: Encode this phrase by Ogden Nash using the Vigenère cipher with a keyword of MODEL.

CIPHER.197.cipherString: What ewe halve tolled us is rubbish. Teh whirled is really a flat plait supported on the bakc of a giant tortoise.
CIPHER.197.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Stephen Hawking and was misheard by Alexa and encoded with a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.204.cipherString: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
CIPHER.204.question: Decode this quote by Steve Maraboli which has been encoded using a Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.194.cipherString: It is one of those lessons that every child should learn: Don't play with fire, sharp objects, or ancient artifacts.
CIPHER.194.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Patricia Briggs which has the word THAT in it once.

CIPHER.192.cipherString: Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.
CIPHER.192.question: Encode this phrase by Steve Maraboli using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 10.  I.e. A is encoded as K.

CIPHER.191.cipherString: Einstein said that if quantum mechanics were correct then the world would be crazy. Einstein was right - the world is crazy.
CIPHER.191.question: Decode this phrase by Daniel M. Greenberger which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.199.cipherString: We especially need imagination in science. It is not all mathematics, nor all logic, but it is somewhat beauty and poetry.
CIPHER.199.question: Solve this Patristocrat encoded quote by Maria Mitchell with a K2 alphabet and starts with WE ESP.
